name: Switch it up! (Bum's)
description:
This is a 2D Top down shooter game. You kill all your enemies, while evading

 bullets. Getting shot by turrets will restart the level. But, a previous life of your

 character from an earlier attempt exists. This previous self will act as a turret against

 you. So, you have to evade them to survive. Additionally, you can move while the

 screen is not black and white, but shooting is unavailable. Likewise, you can shoot

 while the screen is black and white, but you cannot move.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

MOVEMENT CONTROLS : WASD

COMBAT CONTROLS : SPACEBAR OR LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
